src:
Dikalahkan Lazio, Pioli Bilang Milan Sedang Berkembang
04 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Stefano Pioli bisa melihat sisi positif dari tim asuhannya, AC Milan, saat bertemu dengan Lazio baru-baru ini. Meskipun hasil yang didapatkan jauh dari kata memuaskan.
Milan dipertemukan dengan Lazio dalam laga Serie A yang berlangsung pada Senin (4/11/2019) dini hari tadi di San Siro. Pertandingan tersebut berakhir dengan kedudukan 1-2 untuk kekalahan Rossoneri.
Lazio unggul lebih dulu usai Ciro Immobile berhasil menggetarkan jala gawang yang dikawal oleh Gianluigi Donnarumma pada menit ke-25. Milan kemudian menyamakan skor setelah pemain Lazio, Bastos, menyarangkan bola di gawangnya sendiri tiga menit berselang.
Kedudukan imbang tersebut sempat bertahan cukup lama. Sayangnya, pertahanan Milan tak sanggup membendung serangan Biancocelesti. Mereka kebobolan gol yang dicetak Joaquin Correa di menit ke-83 dan membuat skor menjadi 2-1 untuk keunggulan Lazio.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Defeated Lazio, Pioli Said Milan Are Developing
Nov 04 2019, 08:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Stefano Pioli can see the positive side of his team, AC Milan, when he met with Lazio recently. Although the results obtained are far from satisfying words.
Milan met with Lazio in the Serie A match which took place on Monday (11/04/2019) early this morning at the San Siro. The match ended in a 1-2 position for the Rossoneri defeat.
Lazio went ahead after Ciro Immobile managed to vibrate the goal net that was escorted by Gianluigi Donnarumma in the 25th minute. Milan then leveled the score after Lazio's Bastos had put the ball in his own net three minutes later.
The position of the draw had lasted long enough. Unfortunately, the Milan defense was unable to stem the Biancocelesti's attack. They conceded a goal scored by Joaquin Correa in the 83rd minute and made it 2-1 to Lazio's advantage.

Scroll down to read full information.
